summary: התוכנית להכשרת בכירים בניהול אבטחת מידע, סייבר ופרטיות, כוללת הכנה להסמכות בינלאומיות כמו CISSP, CISM, CC, CIPP/E, C|CISO. התוכנית מועברת בהדרכת מרצים בולטים בתחום ומעניקה שתי תעודות אוניברסיטאיות של CISO ושל DPO. התוכנית מכינה לקראת חמש הסמכות בינלאומיות יוקרתיות ומציעה הכשרה מעמיקה בתחומי אבטחת מידע, סייבר ופרטיות. הקורס כולל 270 שעות אקדמיות פרונטליות ומתקיים בקמפוס אוניברסיטת בר-אילן. התוכנית מיועדת למנהלי אבטחת מידע, בעלי רקע ב-System, תקשורת, מנהלי מערכות מידע, יועצי אבטחת מידע, מבקרי מערכות מידע, קציני בטחון, מנהלי בטחון ונאמני אבטחת מידע במשרדים ממשלתיים.
full_text: COURSE NAME: מנהל אבטחת מידע וסייבר CISO וקצין הגנת הנתונים DPO. COURSE OVERVIEW: The program is designed to train senior executives in information security management, cyber security, and privacy. It includes full preparation for international certifications such as CISSP, CISM, CC, CIPP/E, and C|CISO. The program is unique in Israel, offering two university certificates: CISO and DPO, and prepares students for five prestigious international certifications. The program is conducted by leading lecturers in the field, and upon completion, students are qualified as information security and cyber managers and data protection officers in companies. The academic partnership with organizations like ISACA and ISC2 allows learning through original kits and internationally certified lecturers. COURSE LEADERSHIP: The program is led by Mr. Eran Shaham, Director of the School of Hi-Tech and Cyber Security at Bar-Ilan University. Professional advisors include Mr. Oren Yeger, Attorney Efrat Greenboim, Mr. Nitzan Levy, and Mr. Hillel Koberovsky, all with extensive experience in teaching various information security and cyber professions. PREREQUISITES: Understanding of technical and managerial concepts in English. Passing an admission interview with the program advisor. COURSE SCHEDULE: Start Date: 15.01.2024. Duration: Approximately seven months. Schedule: Sundays and Wednesdays from 17:30 to 21:30. Academic Hours: 270 frontal academic hours. LEARNING FORMAT: Classes are held at the School of Hi-Tech and Cyber Security, Bar-Ilan University Campus, Ramat Gan. Some classes may be conducted via Zoom according to Home Front Command and university instructions. TUITION AND FEES: Registration Fee: 480 ₪. Tuition Fee: 16,500 ₪. The course price includes original international study kits worth thousands of shekels. International certification exams are external and require separate payment. COURSE TOPICS: The program consists of fourteen domains, each preparing for international exams and providing in-depth knowledge of the CISO's world and roles. Domain 1: Preparation - Understanding lab topologies, using defense and attack technologies, secure coding methodologies, and evaluation of tools. Domain 2: Security and Risk Management - Concepts of confidentiality, integrity, availability, security governance, compliance, legal issues, risk management, threat modeling, and security awareness. Domain 3: Asset Security - Information and asset classification, ownership, retention, and security controls. Domain 4: Privacy - Data protection laws, personal data processing, data subjects' rights, security of processing, and privacy governance. Domain 5: Information Security Governance - Strategy development, corporate governance alignment, legal requirements, and senior management commitment. Domain 6: Security Architecture and Engineering - Secure design principles, security models, system security capabilities, and vulnerability assessment. Domain 7: Communication and Network Security - Secure design principles in network architectures and communication channels. Domain 8: Identity and Access Management - Access control, identity management, and authorization mechanisms. Domain 9: Security Assessment and Testing - Assessment strategies, security control testing, and audit facilitation. Domain 10: Security Operations - Investigation support, logging, monitoring, resource protection, and disaster recovery. Domain 11: Software Development Security - Security in SDLC, secure coding guidelines, and software security assessment. Domain 12: Cloud Security - Cloud architecture, governance, legal issues, compliance, and security as a service. Domain 13: Incident Management and Response - Incident detection, response plans, communication processes, and risk reassessment. Domain 14: Final Steps for becoming a CISO - Strategic planning, enterprise security program development, vendor management, and final project presentation. REGISTRATION AND CONTACT INFORMATION: Registration is conducted through Eran Shaham Ltd. for Bar-Ilan University.
